projects.title: SpeedGate
projects.description: Considering a single node environment where the server is deployed, I made an API which when called returns the number of requests made till now and rate limits any requests after X requests with 60 seconds. It returns a 429 HTTP error response when the user hits the rate limit X. The response header contains the X-WAIT-TILL (time when the next API request to succeed) and X-RATE-LIMIT (the rate limit X enforced) details.
